Title: Radio Sama
Description: Jordan station Sama Christian Arabic Radio رادیو سما

Title: Radio Fann 97.7 FM
Description: أهلا وسهلا بصفحة راديو فن، أول قناة إذاعية أردنية خاصة منذ عام 2003! رادیو فن اردن  اسمعونا على تردد 97.7 في عمان و العقبة وفي باقي المحافظات على 103.3  .    Long Description    منذ انطلاقتنا كأول قناة إذاعية أردنية خاصة عام 2003 و نحن نضع امام أعيننا هدف الوصول الى الأردنيين في الاردن و كل أنحاء العالم من خلال تحمل مسؤوليتنا بتقديم مادة إعلامية فريدة تصل بكل وضوح و سلاسة الى جميع المستمعين. كانت الانطلاقة بفريق عمل مؤهل و يتمتع بالخبرة اللازمة لقيادة ركب الإذاعات الخاصة في الاردن ، من خلال مجموعة فريدة من البرامج التي تنوعت بشكل يرضي جميع الاذواق. واليوم راديو فن يعمل بكل طاقته و بأحدث الوسائل التكنولوجية المتاحة للبث الإذاعي في العالم للاستمرار بلعب الدور الأساسي الذي أخذه على عاتقه وبكل مهنية لإيصال مادة دسمة و متنوعة تحترم ذوق المستمع و عقله و مبادئه . Radio Fann FM is Jordan's Number 1 radio station, broadcasting live from Amman, 24 hours a day, seven days a week. The station's format is a mix of top hits from eighties, nineties and today's hits and various customized programs

Title: Radio Hala
Description: Pop radio on 91.1 FM in Amman and 105.5 in Zarqa راديو هلا للهواتف الذكية

Title: Hala Radio
Description: About Hala FM Owned by the Jordanian Armed Forces, Hala FM was launched in October 2010 to provide its listeners with the most energetic, interactive and entertaining programs; in addition to the latest Arabic music hits and regular local, regional and international news updates. Hala FM is broadcasting from Amman 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. It is the only radio station in Jordan that reaches the entire Kingdom as well as several neighbouring countries. The music and programming are prepared and presented by a team of local professionals who are working hard to always ensure satisfying the whole nation who really deserves the best. The Naming Hala: A welcome note, a sign of greeting, a warm gesture, a new Voice in town Aiming to knock the doors of every Jordanian home, Hala FM shall bring the renowned Jordanian greetings and transform it into a spectrum of voices and rhythms. While the word Hala depicts the first sign of interaction between any two individuals, the core platform of the station

Title: Radio Mood FM 91.5/92 FM
Description: Mood FM was established in June 2004 and is Jordan’s premier adult contemporary English radio station.Mood FM broadcasts the finest selection of music from legendary artists who have stood the testvof time. Its diverse music format includes songs from the 70s, 80s, 90s, 00s and today..Our aim every day is to take listeners on a musical journey evoking memories and emotions. Core artists include Michael Jackson, Madonna, Prince and the Bee Gees.

Title: Radio Bliss Amman 104.3 FM
Description: Broadcasting from the heart of Jordan's capital Amman, Bliss 104.3 is a variety music station playing modern classics spanning three decades, as well as handpicked hits. Our station strikes a nostalgic nerve with listeners who wish to remember a fonder time - perhaps from their teenage years or college days. Complete with engaging live programs, sharp presenters, and a tasteful selection of specialty shows, Bliss promises to deliver an all-around feel good sound

Title: Radio Beat FM Amman 102.5
